mapper.select: select wp.res_id from warrior_permissions wp where wp.type = #{type} and wp.own_id = #{ownId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM warrior_permissions WHERE own_id = #{ownId} AND type = #{type}
mapper.select: SELECT group_concat(permission) from( select res.permission,1 as num from warrior_resources res left join (select own_id,res_id from warrior_permissions) wp on res.res_id = wp.res_id left join warrior_user_role wr on wp.own_id = wr.role_id where wr.user_id = #{userId} and res.permission is not null and res.permission != '' and res.status = 0 GROUP BY permission) t GROUP BY t.num
